content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Coal Mining Station at (-14.0, -15.0)
- Burner mining drill at (24.0, -15.0)
- Wooden chest at (23.5, -16.5) containing 301 coal

###Iron Ore Mining Station at (-14.0, 23.0)
- Burner mining drill at (-14.0, 23.0) with coal fuel
- Wooden chest at (-14.5, 21.5) containing 344 iron ore

###Iron Smelting Station at (-10.0, 20.0)
- Two stone furnaces at (-11.0, 20.0) and (-9.0, 20.0), both fueled with coal

###Copper Processing Complex at (22.0, 20.0)
- Burner mining drill at (20.0, 20.0) mining copper ore
- Input wooden chest at (20.5, 21.5) containing 390 copper ore
- Secondary wooden chest at (22.5, 21.5) containing 373 copper ore
- Stone furnace at (24.0, 20.0) fueled with coal
- Output wooden chest at (24.5, 17.5) containing 53 copper plates
- Burner inserter at (24.5, 18.5) moving items from furnace to output chest
- Burner inserter at (22.5, 20.5) attempting to move items from chest to furnace

ERROR TIPS

###Incorrect Inserter Configuration
- Ensure inserter pickup and drop positions align with the intended source and destination entities
- When connecting chests to furnaces, verify the inserter's direction and position allows for proper item transfer
- Current inserter at (22.5, 20.5) is not correctly positioned to feed the furnace at (24.0, 20.0)

###Fuel Management
- Monitor fuel levels in burner mining drills to prevent "out of fuel" warnings
- The coal mining drill is currently out of fuel and needs attention

###Process Flow Issues
- Furnaces showing "no ingredients" status indicate a break in the material flow
- Verify the complete path from resource gathering to processing has proper connections and working inserters
